Title: WFControls
Description:
WFControls is a small set of Windows Forms Controls developed in C# targeting Visual Studio 2008 and .NET 3.5.

The intent ist to create some reusability to some small custom controls that otherwise would have to be recreated per project.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WFControls is a small set of Windows Forms Controls developed in C# targeting Visual Studio 2008 and .NET 3.5.

The intent ist to create some reusability to some small custom controls that otherwise would have to be recreated per project.

ATTENTION:
The Controlls are far from finished and the Code is sparely documented!!

Status:
- Finished
MaskedTextBox
- Halfway finished
CollapsibleControl
- All others are still under severe development
